cause.description:
Score10 is a concept to help build SOUTH AFRICA towards "The Core 1" in three yrs time and beyond. We have 10 drivers to help us get to every crack & crevis in South Afria to help uplift & feed minds. Our 1st Driver is "BUY A LOAF OF BREAD" - Our Public Request: everyone buy someone a loaf of Bread in South Africa. No matter where in South Africa we are someone needs a few slices or could really do with that loaf. It's our mindsets we aim to add-just... We've tried everything as a country however WE HAVEN'T TRIED TO MAKE IT WORK ....TOGETHER AT ONCE.UNITED.Here's a great opportunity. Score10 - There's 1 in every 1 See more here www.myspace.com/Score10 Check out our clothing label at Sowearto Zone,Rosbank & Campus Square Melville.
1. HELPING FEED THE MINDS OF SOUTH AFRICANS
2. SOUTH AFRICANS SCORE10 FOR SOUTH AFRICA
3. UPLIFTING EVERY CRACK & CREVIS IN SOUTH AFRICA
cause.mission: To "plant-the-seed" and help add-just-minds. Our souls aim is to uplift souls. The excuse is 2010 & You are needed, we need you, you need you & South Africa needs YOU. It's all about YOU
cause.name: Score 10s 1Loves Project: "Buy a loaf of bread"
